Name: Larissa
Description: The central and largest region of Thessaly, known for its plains and agricultural production.

Name: Trikala
Description: A region known for its historical sites, including Meteora, and its agricultural activity.

Name: Karditsa
Description: A region with fertile plains and mountains, often called the agricultural heart of Thessaly.

Name: Magnesia
Description: A coastal region, known for the city of Volos, Mount Pelion, and beautiful beaches.

Name: Skiathos
Description: A famous island in the northern part of the Aegean Sea, known for its beaches and nightlife.
